message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its unique features and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please don't hesitate to share your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,300,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I believe the value of this product is significantly higher than your proposed price.  I'm willing to meet you halfway and come down to $1,350,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,325,000. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
